post:
FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY--WHILE SUPPLIES LAST
--------------------------------------------------------------
Garnet Networks is having a one-time sale that lets you own a great VPS for an extremely cheap monthly price! For **$5.05/MO**, you can get our Amethyst Plan _(Regularly $8.08/MO)_. Not only will you **get that price for life**, but we'll even make the **first month $2.02 by using the promo code listed below!** Even with our cheap prices, we still offer great hardware including a **MegaRAID10** Array with **2 Dedicated SSD's for R/W** and some of the best support out there. Not only will we fix all your problems, we'll even help set things up for you!

Garnet is a somewhat new company with a goal to allow everyone to afford a VPS. While we might be new as a company, our team is full of experienced members who are more than happy to work with you.

**System Specs**

Our systems are all guaranteed to run the following, or higher, hardware specifications where available.

> ***CPU**: Intel® Xeon® Processor E3-1270 v3 (8M Cache, 3.50 GHz)
> 
> ***Hardware Raid**: MegaRAID10 Controller + 2 dedicated SSD's for Read/Write
> 
> ***Virtualization**: KVM
> 
> ***Network**: 1Gbps (w/ 10Gbps Burst)
> 
> ***OS**: Windows Server 2008/2012 & All Linux Distributions
>
> ***Host**: ColoCrossing (Hosted in New York)

**Speed Tests**

> ![](http://www.speedtest.net/result/2956115771.png)

**What You'lll Get**

> ***Disk**: 50GB
> 
> ***Cores**: 2
> 
> ***Memory**: 1024MB
> 
> ***IPs**: 1
> 
> ***Bandwidth**: 512GB

Test IP: 192.3.9.226

**[Click here to Order Now](http://garnetnetworks.com/clientportal/cart.php?a=add&pid=15) and use Promo Code "U25YVWGWM2" to get the first month for only $2.02!**

**Have a question? Post a comment here or (preferably) [open a Pre-Sales support ticket!](http://garnetnetworks.com/clientportal/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=1)**
